name: BICHITO
description:
Hatch one of the different eggs to start raising your own Bichito! Feed it, clean it, play with it and watch it evolve. Visit the playground to make him interact with other Bichitos, making it a social or anti-social creature. How you take care of it will affect its afterlife! 

New in version 1.2: Fixed several bugs. Added Judgement Day, included Angel and Demon characters.
